sentences.en: And meanwhile the quite obvious cause of vagrancy the face.
sentences.cn: 同时,流浪的十分明显的理由却近在眼前.

sentences.en: Like a swallow in vagrancy, covering all the streets lanes in the Capital.
sentences.cn: 像一只流浪的燕子, 穿梭于京城的每个大街小巷.

sentences.en: Strangers are picked up for vagrancy after three days.
sentences.cn: 外地人来此超过三天的一律以流浪罪加以拘捕.

sentences.en: The tramp was arrested for vagrancy.
sentences.cn: 这个流浪汉因流浪而被捕.

sentences.en: Vagrancy and begging has become commonplace in London.
sentences.cn: 流浪和乞讨在伦敦已变得很常见。

sentences.en: Vagrancy and begging has become commonplace in the city.
sentences.cn: 流浪和乞讨在这个城市里已变得很常见。

words.tran_cn: 流浪的；流浪者的；浪荡的；漂泊的
游民；流浪者；无赖；漂泊者
流浪；漂泊；思想游移不定

trans.tran_cn: （说话的，思想的）游移不定，漂泊，流浪，离题
trans.tran_en: the criminal offence of living on the street and begging from people
